name: Zidane: Football Generation
overview: Zidane: Football Generation is a Sports game, developed by Aqua Pacific and published by Cryo Interactive, which was released in Europe in 2002. Live the ultimate football experience with Zidane Football Generation: Three different views available during the match. 16 national teams at different levels. Thee game modes: friendly, arcade, tournament. Save games during tournaments. And not forgetting the star himself, Zidane!
